name: OrientDB FetchPlan string
description: A pattern matches FetchPlan string of OrientDB.
content:
// A pattern matches FetchPlan string of OrientDB.
// [[levels]]<fieldPath>:<depth-level>*
// See http://orientdb.com/docs/last/Fetching-Strategies.html
// This pattern assumes maximum level(depth) is 999(\d{1,3}).
// As a result, $1 will represents 'levels', ($2, $4) will represent 'fieldPath' and ($3, $5) will represent 'depth-level'.

// -- single field:depth
a:-1
a.b:-2
a.b.c:0
a*:123
a.b*:999
in_*:-2
*:0

// -- multiple field:depth
a:-1 a:-1
a.b:-2 a:0 b:3 c:2
a.b.c:0 *:1
a*:123 abcd:0
a.b*:999 a.b.c.d:999
in_*:-2 out_*:-2
in_*:-2 out_*:-2 myValue:-1
*:0 abc:-1

// -- level with single field:depth
[*]a:-1
[2]a.b:-2
[999]a.b.c:0
[1-3]a*:123
[-1]a.b*:999
[1-]in_*:-2
[*]*:0
// -- level with multiple field:depth
[*]a:-1 a:-1
[*]a.b:-2 a:0
[*]a.b.c:0 *:1
[*]a*:123 abcd:0
[-1]a.b*:999 a.b.c.d:999
[1-]in_*:-2 out_*:-2
[0-3]*:0 abc:-1

// -- invalid expressions
a.b*:10000
a.b*:10000 a.b:1
a:
a.:0
a.b.c.:0
a.*:0
*.a:0
a.*.b:0
[]a:-1
[a]a.b:-2
[12345]a.b.c:0
[-]a:0
[1234-]a:0
[-1234]a:0
[-*]a:0
[*-]a:0
